mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C##NUMBERONE.BOARD ( BOARD_NO, REG_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, ASK_CNT, READ_CNT, REG_DT, MOD_DT ) SELECT ROWNUM, 'USER' || LPAD(ROWNUM, 4, '0'), '제목 ' || LPAD(ROWNUM, 7, '0'), '내용 ' || LPAD(ROWNUM, 7, '0'), 0, 0, SYSDATE - ROWNUM / 24, SYSDATE - ROWNUM / 24 FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 202
mapper.update: UPDATE C##NUMBERONE.BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, MOD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO as boardNo, TITLE as title, CONTENTS as contents, READ_CNT as readCnt, REG_ID as regId, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as regDt, TO_CHAR(MOD_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as modDt FROM C##NUMBERONE.BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C##NUMBERONE.BOARD ( BOARD_NO, REG_ID, TITLE, CONTENTS, ASK_CNT, READ_CNT, REG_DT, MOD_DT ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{regId}, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
